tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NN Happiness)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP me)))) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VP (VBG making) (SBAR (S (NP (NNS people)) (VP (VBP smile))))) (, ,) (VP (VBG helping) (NP (NNS people))) (, ,) (VP (VBG giving) (PRT (RP back))))) (. .)))
